message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to purchase it from me for $9500?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. Would you be willing to consider a price of $8500 for the product?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm not quite willing to go as low as $8500. How about we meet in the middle at $9000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $8200 for the product?
I can see you're really trying to get a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to make a bit more of a concession, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $8750?
I'm getting close, but I'm still trying to get as close to your original price as possible. Would you be willing to consider a price of $8000 for the product?
